trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Een verzameling van gebruikersinterface gerelateerde beheert <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Deze klasse kan niet worden overgenomen.

trans-unit.source: Each Adorner can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: Elke Adorner kan worden ingeschakeld en uitgeschakeld.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled Adorner objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Alleen ingeschakelde Adorner objecten treffers test- en paint berichten ontvangt van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: An Adorner can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Kan een Adorner worden weergegeven als een proxy tussen de gebruikersinterface-elementen die betrekking hebben, die bestaan uit alle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objecten, en de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Zie voor meer informatie [gedrag Serviceoverzicht](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The Adorner constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: De constructor Adorner maakt u een nieuwe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>en standaard is ingeschakeld.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> die zijn gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer een <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>is toegevoegd aan de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, de verzameling wordt deze eigenschap ingesteld zodat de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>kunt terugbellen naar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> die zijn gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van een waarde die duiden als de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> is ingeschakeld.

trans-unit.source: If the Enabled property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Als de eigenschap Enabled is `true`, wordt de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>klasse stuurt `HitTest` en `Paint` berichten naar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, als de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> is ingeschakeld, anders, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> verzameling.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Een verzameling van <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> vernieuwen van een adorner-venster.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> vernieuwen van het venster adorner binnen de opgegeven <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Het gebied ongeldig maken.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> vernieuwen van het venster adorner binnen de opgegeven <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> ongeldig maken.
